summary:
**YuYu Hakusho** is a popular Japanese manga and anime series created by Yoshihiro Togashi. It follows Yusuke Urameshi, a teenage troublemaker who dies saving a child and is brought back to life as an "Underworld Detective." He investigates supernatural cases and fights demons. The story combines elements of the occult, horror, and martial arts.

First published in 1990, the manga has sold over 50 million copies worldwide. An anime adaptation aired from 1992 to 1994 and has also been very successful, winning several awards.
title: YuYu Hakusho
